wfov_delta_extinction_vs_time.doc: wfov_geo_corr as deviation from time mean at selected levels--filtered

od_vs_time.doc: Aerosol optical depth vs time at selected altitudes

od_from_int_backscat_vs_time.doc: aerosol od between lowest selected altitude and other selected altitudes from LR and integ backscatter

int_backscat_vs_time.doc: Optical depth of selected layer from integrated backscatter-multiple lidar ratios

parameters.lidar_ratio_list: plot integrated backscat for these lidar ratios
parameters.y max: upper limit of optical depth plot
parameters.y min: lower limit of optical depth plot

extinction_vs_time.doc: Aerosol Extinction vs time at altitude = selected_plot_level

backscatter_vs_time.doc: Aerosol backscatter vs time at altitude = selected_plot_level

scattering_ratio_vs_time.doc: scat ratio vs t at plot_altitude, ave 2*ave_z_bins+1 alt bins

mol/comb_counts_vs_time.doc: mol/comb counts vs time, altitude averaged [bin_1:bin_2]

calibration_coefficients.doc: cal coef, Cmm ,Mol in mol channel and Cmc, mol in combined channel

linear_depolarization_vs_time.doc: Linear depolarization vs time at a list of altitudes
